name: Christmas Horse
description:
🎅🐎 CHRISTMAS HORSE 🎅🐎

A game made on December 22nd, 23rd, and 24th, 2020 on stream.

YOU ARE CHRISTMAS HORSE.

COMPLETE THREE LEVELS.

SUCCEED IN YOUR QUEST.

CHRISTMAS HORSE WAS WRITTEN IN C++ WITH SFML. YOU CAN FIND ITS CODE HERE: CODE REPOSITORY

THE GAME WAS DEVELOPED DURING THREE LIVESTREAMS ON YOUTUBE: DEVELOPMENT STREAM
